articles.title: Dairy Queen offering 75-cent cones to celebrate 75th anniversary - KENS5.com
articles.description: The restaurant chain announced that they are "turning back the clock" to when people could get a chocolate-dipped cone with vanilla soft serve for less than a buck.
articles.content:
TEXAS, USA In celebration of Dairy Queen's 75th anniversary in Texas, folks can get 75-cent cones!
